example.description: Returns all non-executed actions for all Auto Scaling groups.
Returns all non-executed actions for the Auto Scaling group named 'my-test-asg'.
Returns details of any non-executed 'ScaleOut' and 'ScaleIn' actions for all Auto Scaling groups.
Returns details of any non-executed actions since midnight UTC on May 12 2013 for all Auto Scaling groups.
Returns details of any non-executed actions up until midnight UTC on May 12 2013 for all Auto Scaling groups.
Returns details of all non-executed actions across all Auto Scaling groups using manual paging. The action details are retrieved in batches of 10.
